contract.title: Send Application
contract.descr: You can get answers to all your questions related to studying abroad.Visit our office, or leave us a message through the contact form.

about1.aboutDescr: We offer education abroad for different specialties with different duration. The main task of our consultants is to find the optimal program (at the price, set tasks and terms of education) that meets the needs of our clients and is consistent with their financial capabilities. In our work there are no templates, because students come to us with different levels of training, who set themselves different goals.
